description: This repository contains the implementation of a Hybrid Meta-Ensemble (HME) framework for accurate pore pressure prediction in oil and gas drilling operations.
Machine Learning Pipeline Frameworks to Predict Directional Anisotropic Permeabilities From Porous Media Image

CTVAM (Cybersecurity Threat & Vulnerability Analysis Model) is a modular framework for ingesting NVD CVE data, preprocessing vulnerability metrics, performing feature engineering, generating analytics, and applying machine-learning models for severity prediction and risk insights.
A performant and dynamic MachineLearning framework written in .NET

The ECG Analysis and Classification Project is an end-to-end framework for detecting cardiac conditions automatically from electrocardiogram (ECG) signals using machine learning and deep learning techniques.  Built around the PTB Diagnostic ECG Database, this project integrates three main modules:  Data Processing and Visualization  signal cleanin
A set of Docker images that include popular frameworks for machine learning, data science and visualization.
Translation exploration with Transformers and Machine Learning Experimentation Platfroms

Focuses on developing a predictive framework to minimize customer attrition in the telecommunications sector using statistical inference and machine learning. The Telco Customer Churn Dataset was analyzed to construct and compare two distinct models  Logistic Regression (for probabilistic scoring) and a Decision Tree (
This repository is to test popular machine learning and deep learning frameworks
Causal machine learning framework for pharmacovigilance signal detection in electronic health records: Drug-induced acute kidney injury
Code for training and validation

A collection of machine learning projects and experiments covering end-to-end ML pipelines, from model development to deployment. Focused on practical AI engineering, ML frameworks and MLOps practices.

Banks face frequent loan defaults, demanding robust risk management. This study builds a machine learning framework to predict credit defaults using structured financial data. It includes data preprocessing, model building, and fairness evaluation to ensure predictions are both accurate and socially equitable.

This is my final year project where I use machine learning to predict the binding success rate between drug molecules and protein targets. I will code the frontend off of the react framework and use a REST API to connect it to the backend - Neural network, Database

Machine-learning and Bayesian deep-learning framework for transmission line fault classification using dq features, spectrograms, harmonic analysis, and MC-Dropout uncertainty estimation. Includes feature extraction, training scripts, evaluation tools, and reproducible results.
The PennyLane-Qrack plugin integrates the Qrack quantum computing framework with PennyLane's quantum machine learning capabilities.
A Machine Learning Framework for Comprehensive Classification of Plant Transcription Factors

ML-Potion is all about crafting your own machine-learning elixir using the ingredients and frameworks you prefer. Think of the library as a set of building blocksatoms, steps, and componentsthat you can mix, match, and sequence to build a fully customized training or inference pipeline.

This project presents a comprehensive machine learning framework for the identification, analysis, and forecasting of marine eutrophication hotspots in India. Utilizing a national water quality dataset spanning from 2020 to 2023, the study addresses the critical need for proactive environmental management.

This repo contains machine learning and deep learning models for various problems, using frameworks like scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. It includes ML algorithms, neural networks, and notebooks demonstrating data preprocessing, model training, and evaluation.

An open-source Python framework that integrates machine learning interatomic  potentials (MLIPs) with a tailored batched optimization strategy, enabling rapid,  unbiased structure prediction across the full density range

A machine learning framework for simulating and predicting random walks. Includes parameterized bias sampling, enhanced feature engineering, multi-dimensional support, and real-world applications such as financial markets, IoT sensor drift, healthcare monitoring, and cybersecurity.
This repository presents a BERT-based framework, which is a SOTA transformer-based machine learning model for NLP, for early detection of mental health issues through language analysis.
Project that  uses CRISP-DM framework to develop an end-to-end machine learning system using the UCI Heart Disease (Cleveland) dataset.

Official repository for the 2025 NCKU EE Machine Learning UAV Segmentation Project. Provides a complete training and evaluation framework with fog augmentation and mask-overlay tools. Current performance: 4th place on the competition leaderboard.

This project implements a handwritten digit recognizer using both TensorFlow and PyTorch frameworks to classify digits from the MNIST dataset. It provides a direct comparison of the performance and training characteristics between the two popular machine learning libraries.
HLSFactory: A Framework Empowering High-Level Synthesis Datasets for Machine Learning and Beyond
Code for Predicting Content Virality through Integrated Machine Learning and Network Diffusion Modeling

This project implements a comprehensive machine learning framework for managing a $1 billion portfolio in the oil and gas equity sector. The system combines traditional quantitative finance with advanced deep learning techniques to optimize returns while maintaining rigorous risk controls.
Implementation of a unified explainability and trust framework for machine learning-based flood risk prediction, including SHAP, LIME, counterfactuals, robustness analysis, and the UFXI metric.
Machine learning framework for predicting Service Life Ratio (SLR) of recycled electrochemical membranes using scenario-based simulations and Random Forest regression.
A framework that uses preprocessing and multiple machine learning models to collect data and predict economic crises for countries around the world.

In this study, we introduce a novel machine learning based framework that predicts austenitic grain growth behaviour directly from chemical composition and process conditions, utilizing a comprehensive dataset of 1039 experimentally validated samples. Among various algorithms tested, the XGBoost model demonstrated exceptional predictive capability

A machine-learning framework that predicts Ultimate Tensile Strength (UTS) of steels using composition + heat-treatment + processing parameters. The dataset is synthetically generated using metallurgy-based rules (HallPetch, tempering response, quenching behavior, composition strengthening).
A Go-based framework for real-time monitoring, explanation, and drift detection of deployed machine learning models.

Machine Learning Framework for Identifying Lymph Node Metastasis Biomarkers in Breast Cancer. This repository provides an end-to-end workflow integrating differential expression analysis, machine learningbased feature selection, survival modelling, and external biological validation for robust biomarker discovery.
A full-stack website built using the React and FastAPI frameworks, utilizing machine learning to recommend comics based on previous ratings.
Hyrax - A framework for machine learning in astronomy

A lightweight and modular Model Extractor tool for loading, analyzing, and exporting machine-learning models. Supports extracting model layers, parameters, weights, metadata, and architecture summaries from frameworks like PyTorch or TensorFlow. Ideal for ML engineers who need to inspect, debug, convert, or document model structures.

Stock Prediction Portal  A practice full-stack dashboard built with React (frontend) and Django REST Framework (backend). Implements JWT auth, axios interceptors, protected routes, and a modular API for future machine-learning model integration.
A curated list of awesome machine learning frameworks, libraries and software (by language). I
A curated list of awesome Machine Learning frameworks, libraries and software. With repository stars and forks

Machine learning framework for urban flood probability prediction using meteorological, topographic, and hydrologic features. Achieves R = 0.861 with Neural Networks. CSE 572 Final Project, Arizona State University.

This project presents an AI-driven cloud security auditing platform that automatically collects AWS configuration data, detects misconfigurations, evaluates risk using machine learning, maps violations to compliance frameworks, and visualizes attack paths through interactive 3D attack graphs, supported by reports and a live dashboard.
Open source machine learning framework to automate text- and voice-based conversations: NLU, dialogue management, connect to Slack, Facebook, and more - Create chatbots and voice assistants
Repository associated with article "Flexible Framework for Surface Hopping: From Hybrid Schemes for Machine Learning to Benchmarkable Nonadiabatic Dynamics"

MAPRL (Multiagent Planning for Reinforcement Learning) is a framework that integrates Reward Machines (RMs) with Partial-Order Planning (POP) to enhance coordination in multi-agent reinforcement learning (MARL).

This project focuses on interpreting and explaining complex tree-based machine learning models using two powerful model-explainability frameworks: SHAP (SHapley Additive exPlanations) and LIME (Local Interpretable Model-Agnostic Explanations).

We present a comprehensive physics-informed machine learning frameworkPhysics-Guided Equation Discovery (PGED)that discovers a full, interpretable dynamical equation for the geomagnetic Dst index using only its historical time series. Trained on 139,872 hourly measurements, PGED recovers an 11-term sparse ordinary differential equation that.
Research framework for exploring machine learning techniques applied to quantum systems, including MPS, VQE, generative models, and quantum-aware architectures.
Tech Soft 3D tutorials of python CAD framework for machine learning development. Requires HOOPS AI

An open-source dataset of synthetic power quality disturbances (PQD), ideal for training and validating machine learning models. Signals are generated using established mathematical models from scientific literature, with parameter ranges conforming to the IEEE 1159 standard. Includes a Python analysis framework for statistical exploration.

flowMagic is an R package for automated bivariate gating of flow cytometry (FCM) data. It uses a machine-learning model trained on both experts data and a large, high-quality FCM dataset generated by EVE Online players. The package also provides an extensive visualization toolkit and integrates seamlessly with the flowCore/flowWorkspace frameworks

Web App for the Metal Input Line Entry System (MILES)  a comprehensive framework for describing surface properties using a standardized line notation format. MILES strings can be converted to numerical representations suitable for machine learning models in materials science applications.

Developed an explainable AI framework integrating machine learning for accurate brain tumor MRI classification. Enhanced model transparency through interpretability techniques, enabling clinicians to understand decision logic and improve diagnostic reliability in medical image analysis.
A unified framework for machine learning with time series
Framework de Machine Learning Escalable para la Vigilancia Epidemiolgica del Dengue en Colombia - Sistema de Alerta Temprana de Dengue para Cali usando XGBoost y GitHub Actions.

A high-performance data processing engine built with Rust, designed for modern machine learning workflows. Zi provides a unified framework for data quality assessment, cleaning, transformation, sampling, and augmentation with exceptional speed and reliability.
Geospatial Machine Learning Framework for Maritime Anomaly Detection and Illegal Fishing Prevention
This project implements a scale-guided multi-organ segmentation framework using statistical machine learning and a ResNet-based deep learning model.

MLOptimizer is a comprehensive framework for automatically generating optimized machine learning models while capturing detailed hardware performance metrics. It provides a distributed system for model training, hyperparameter optimization, and hardware resource monitoring.

Cross-platform benchmarking framework for evaluating machine learning models in ransomware detection across macOS, Linux, and Windows. Includes 8 ML algorithms tested on the MLRan dataset with comprehensive performance metrics.

A machine learning model to predict loan default risk based on  customer financial and credit features. It uses LightGBM, a powerful gradient boosting  framework, combined with feature engineering, cross-validation, and scaling techniques to  ensure robust and generalizable results.

A comprehensive checkpoint management and experiment tracking system for machine learning models. Intelligent model checkpointing with automated experiment tracking, performance analytics, and training resumption. Built for production ML workflows with support    for PyTorch, TensorFlow, JAX, and custom model frameworks.

This repository contains the implementation of a hybrid physics-machine learning framework for autonomous pH adjustment in complex buffered systems. The system combines Theoretical Titration Curve Generation modeling with active learning to enable rapid, precise pH optimization using low-cost automated hardware.
interpretable machine learning framework for pcos detection using shap and lime

AI-driven discovery of Metal Organic Frameworks (MOFs) for efficient CO capture from cement plants and catalytic conversion into methanol using solar energy. Includes datasets, preprocessing scripts, machine learning models, and analysis notebooks.

ML-Pipe-Deploy is a comprehensive, open-source framework that simplifies and standardizes the deployment of complete machine learning pipelinesfrom data processing and model training to serving and monitoring. It transforms scattered ML scripts into production-ready, scalable, and maintainable systems with minimal configuration.
Code for AdaNUMA: A Machine Learning-Guided Adaptive NUMA Scheduling Framework

A comprehensive, data-driven framework for optimizing shot peening processes to enhance the fatigue life of critical aerospace aluminum alloys. This project integrates Machine Learning (ML) for accurate residual stress prediction and Response Surface Methodology (RSM) for multi-objective process parameter optimization.
Data and Codes for Integrated Design Framework for Titanium Aluminides Through Interpretable Machine Learning

A comprehensive platform for building, training, and deploying intelligent NLU chatbots powered by advanced Machine Learning algorithms and the RASA framework. Features a Next.js frontend and a Python dual-mode backend
CatBench - Benchmark Framework of Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials in Adsorption Energy Predictions

This project presents a practical approach to improving retail inventory accuracy using data-driven forecasting. By combining statistical models, modern machine-learning techniques, and reinforcement learning, the study builds a structured framework capable of predicting demand, planning reorder cycles, and reducing supply-chain inefficiencies.
Anvil is a Rust-based machine learning framework designed to combine the performance of low-level linear algebra with the ease of high-level ML APIs.

A machine learning framework that predicts book popularity ratings by extracting sentiment and emotional features from narrative   text. Uses NLP techniques (VADER sentiment analysis, NRC emotion lexicon) combined with RNN/LSTM models to analyze 1,160+ Project   Gutenberg eBooks and predict Goodreads ratings
Algorithmic Trading in Python with Machine Learning

SAFER-6G : Framework IA pour la scurit des rseaux 6G. Le projet utilise le Machine Learning pour analyser le trafic rseau simul, dtecter les cyberattaques en temps rel (dbit, latence, etc.), et prsenter les alertes sur un tableau de bord interactif.

Accent Converter is an AIpowered Django web application that processes audio files, performs accent conversion using machine learning models, and generates bilingual subtitles. It combines speech processing, transliteration, and a scalable backend with a simple, interactive frontend for accessibility.
A twolayer security framework is proposed for Internet of Vehicles (IoV) environments that combines lightweight cryptography with a machine learningbased Network Intrusion Detection System (NIDS).

brpc is an Industrial-grade RPC framework using C++ Language, which is often used in high performance system such as Search, Storage, Machine learning, Advertisement, Recommendation etc. "brpc" means "better RPC".

An explainable machine learning framework for predicting compressive and flexural strengths of CNT-reinforced composites using Random Forest and XGBoost. Includes preprocessing scripts, model training, parity plots, ICE-based interpretability, and evaluation metrics.
Curated list of Kotlin libraries, tools & frameworks for AI, LLMs, agents, DSLs, and machine learning.
An evaluation framework for machine learning models simulating high-throughput materials discovery.
C++ framework for realtime machine learning.

A framework for evaluating explainable AI (XAI) methods in drug discovery using multiple machine learning architectures. This repository implements three distinct model architectures (CNN, Random Forest, and RGCN) and provides a hierarchical four-tier evaluation framework for assessing the quality and reliability of their explanations.
Foam-Agent: An end-to-end, composable multi-agent framework for automating CFD simulations in OpenFOAM. NeurIPS 2025 Machine Learning and the Physical Sciences Workshop.
Open-source machine learning framework developed by Google for building and training neural networks and other AI models.

Comparative analysis of machine learning classifiers on the UCI Bank Marketing dataset using the CRISP-DM framework. Models include Logistic Regression, KNN, Decision Tree, and SVM, with tuning and class imbalance handling for improved F1 and ROC-AUC.
Machine Learning Framework For Forest Fire Prediction Using NDVI & Synthetic Weather Data
PArallel Distributed Deep LEarning: Machine Learning Framework from Industrial Practice &

Welcome to my project! Here I developed a Python framework for AI-driven risk modeling, using Restricted Boltzmann Machines (RBMs) for probability distribution learning, Monte Carlo simulations for scenario testing, and advanced statistical techniques to evaluate loan default risk and portfolio losses. Includes visualization dashboards for decision

A fully manual neural network implementation developed for my university project. This project includes weight initialization, forward propagation, backpropagation, sigmoid activation, gradient computation, and parameter updates implemented from scratch without using machine learning frameworks.

FlaMMA (Flaky Mitigation & Monitoring Approach) is a framework for detecting, mitigating, and monitoring flaky tests in real projects. It combines rerun analysis, machine learning, and automated repair strategies to improve test reliability, reduce CI instability, and support more trustworthy software testing.

According to an academic pre-print titled DSperse: A Framework for Targeted Verification in Zero-Knowledge Machine Learning by Dan Ivanov, Tristan Freiberg and Haruna Isah, DSperse is designed for distributed machine learning inference with strategic cryptographic verification (zero-knowledge proofs of sub-computations).

A next-generation AutoML construction framework that lets developers, researchers, and ML engineers design, evolve, and orchestrate machine learning pipelines as modular systems  not pre-built black boxes.
Python project integrated with machine learning and django framework.
